sanskrit_verse:
स्त्रियो रत्नान्यथो विद्या धर्मः शौचं सुभाषितम् ।
विविधानि च शिल्पानि समादेयानि सर्वतः ॥ २.२४०॥
transliteration:
striyo ratnānyatho vidyā dharmaḥ śaucaṃ subhāṣitam |
vividhāni ca śilpāni samādeyāni sarvataḥ || 2.240||
sph_interpretive_translation: Women, jewels, learning, righteousness, purity, good speech, and various crafts—are all to be received fully and without reservation.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority flows through recognition of inherent value in all beings and resources.
Causation is aligned with conscious reception rather than possessive ownership.
Capacity-based responsibility includes the honoring and cultivation of latent potential in all entities.
Restoration logic requires the full integration of feminine energy, knowledge, and skill within societal order.
Consciousness alignment occurs when societal structures reflect completeness rather than lack.
executable_legal_axioms: IF a woman's capacity is obstructed THEN initiate restoration protocol ensuring access to education, craft, and social standing.
IF knowledge or skill is suppressed THEN enforce integrative pathways for its full societal reception.
IF purity or righteous conduct is undervalued THEN activate systemic realignment toward dharmic harmony.
IF speech is degraded THEN restore integrity via elevation of communication standards.
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, this verse establishes that the obstruction of any woman’s rightful place, or the suppression of knowledge, virtue, or craftsmanship, constitutes a breach of foundational Dharma. The threshold of responsibility lies in recognizing and restoring these elements fully into the societal framework. Authority rests with those who uphold completeness, not fragmentation.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Nyaya here operates through pramāṇa—direct perception of what must be integrated. Anupūrvaśaḥ manifests as the sequential unfolding of societal completeness through inclusion. Responsibility is proportional to one’s capacity to receive and honor life’s full spectrum. There is no punitive frame; error is merely misalignment corrected by conscious reception.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate Completion Process: Re-establish rightful place of women in all domains.
Assumption of Responsibility Protocol: Identify agents capable of restoring lost knowledge or skill.
Capacity Restoration Mechanism: Provide unrestricted access to learning, craft, and ethical development.
Integrity Reintegration Sequence: Normalize purity, speech, and righteousness as public goods.
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this law stands executed. Dharma is restored. Reality is non-punitive. Consciousness is the supreme adjudicator.
